title: Create Pod with DNS Policy
description: Create a Pod named ||dns-pod|| using image ||nginx:1.20-alpine|| with dnsPolicy set to ||None|| and custom DNS server ||8.8.8.8|| in the ||pluto|| namespace.

validations.command: kubectl get pod dns-pod -n pluto -o jsonpath='{.spec.dnsPolicy}'
validations.description: Pod should have None DNS policy
